title: Bloomberg Markets: Ripley on Transparent, Calculated Fed

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Charles Ripley\u0010Senior Investment Strategist\u0010Allianz Investment Management\u0010Discussing takeaways from Wednesday's FOMC meeting and outlook for markets.
